trans-unit.source: Defines how you want the group to look at each level.
trans-unit.target: 定義您想要查看每個層級的群組的方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of alternating <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定替代編號<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The AlternationCount property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: AlternationCount 屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>附加的屬性可讓您指定兩個或多個替代外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定每個第三個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>交替的背景色彩

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is assigned to each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指派給每個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> begins at 0, increments until it is AlternationCount minus 1, and then restarts at 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>從 0 開始，直到 AlternationCount 減 1，然後再重新啟動 0 遞增。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, if AlternationCount is 3 and there are seven <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the following table lists the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 AlternationCount 為 3，有七個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>中的物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>下, 表列出<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>每個項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>

trans-unit.source: One method is to bind properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.ContainerStyle%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個方法是將屬性中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.ContainerStyle%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.ContainerStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A>繫結

trans-unit.source: You can then use an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter> to specify which value should be applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> that has a certain <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>來指定應該套用哪一個值到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem>具有特定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AlternationConverter>

trans-unit.source: You can also use triggers to change the value of a property depending on the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用觸發程序來變更其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.AlternationIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值而定的屬性值

trans-unit.source: The number of alternating <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 數目替代<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref> generated for each item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要套用的樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>產生每個項目。

trans-unit.source: This property is a rare case where creating a <xref:System.Windows.Style> inline in property element syntax, rather than creating the style as a resource, is a reasonable alternative methodology.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是罕見情況下建立其中<xref:System.Windows.Style>內嵌在屬性項目語法，而不是建立為資源，樣式是合理的替代方法。</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *ResourceExtension* One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*ResourceExtension*下列其中之一︰ `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *StyleResourceKey* The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: *StyleResourceKey*識別所要求的樣式的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中現有的資源

trans-unit.source: The style that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref> generated for each item.
trans-unit.target: 要套用的樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>產生每個項目。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enables the application writer to provide custom selection logic for a style to apply to each generated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可讓應用程式寫入器，以提供自訂選取邏輯，要套用到每個產生的樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An object that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，衍生自<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.StyleSelector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default style of the group.
trans-unit.target: 取得群組的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性項目用法``` ```

trans-unit.source: The default style of the group.
trans-unit.target: 群組的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the default <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate"></xref> that creates the panel used to layout the items.
trans-unit.target: 識別預設<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate"></xref>會建立 [面板] 中用來配置項目。

trans-unit.source: When a default panel is needed this is the panel that is supplied.
trans-unit.target: 當需要預設面板這是提供的面板。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定複合字串，指定如何格式化的標頭就會顯示為字串。

trans-unit.source: HeaderStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: HeaderStringFormat 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>, the HeaderStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle>，則會忽略 HeaderStringFormat 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the header if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 複合字串，指定如何格式化的標頭就會顯示為字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the group header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來顯示群組標題的範本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> object that is used to display the group header.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref>用來顯示群組標頭的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enables the application writer to provide custom selection logic for a template that is used to display the group header.
trans-unit.target: 可讓應用程式寫入器的範本，用來顯示群組標頭中提供自訂選取邏輯。

trans-unit.source: An object that derives from <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，衍生自<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether items corresponding to empty groups should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該顯示項目對應到空群組。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to not display empty groups; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要顯示空的群組。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.PropertyChanged"></xref> event using the provided arguments.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupStyle.PropertyChanged"></xref>事件使用提供的引數。

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 所引發的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template that creates the panel used to layout the items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的範本會建立 [面板] 中，用來配置項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate"></xref> object that creates the panel used to layout the items.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsPanelTemplate"> </xref>物件建立 [面板] 中，用來配置項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 當屬性值變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
